body:
Dutch: Hallo, ik ben ijskoud. Welkom op mijn AMA. Ik maak maps. Ik ben 20 jaar oud en ik woon in Nederland. 

English: Hey. I make maps. Welcome to my AMA. I am 20 years old and live in the Netherlands.
body_tagged:
Dutch: Hallo, ik ben ijskoud. Welkom op mijn AMA. Ik maak maps. Ik ben 20 jaar oud en ik woon in Nederland. 

English: Hey. I make maps. Welcome to my AMA. I am 20 years old and live in the Netherlands.
title: ijskoud AMA Dutch/English

replies.body: I really just like the server because I came from Overcast. And what do you think about Avicus?
replies.body_tagged: I really just like the server because I came from Overcast. And what do you think about Avicus?

replies.body: You know English and Dutch! Check out translate.avicus.net! :P
replies.body_tagged: You know English and Dutch! Check out translate.avicus.net! :P

replies.body:
Hi! Welcome to Avicus :D I hope you have great time here.

What's your real name?
Favorite color?
Favorite food?
Favorite map on Avicus (if you have one)?
Opinions on South Korea and Greece?

That will be all, see you in game! xD
replies.body_tagged:
Hi! Welcome to Avicus :D I hope you have great time here.

What's your real name?
Favorite color?
Favorite food?
Favorite map on Avicus (if you have one)?
Opinions on South Korea and Greece?

That will be all, see you in game! xD

replies.body:
What's your real name? My real name is Ronan Bakker
Favorite color? My favorite color is purple
Favorite food? I like the most pasta
Favorite map on Avicus (if you have one)? My favorite map is Dust Devils
Opinions on South Korea and Greece? I don't know both countries. But i really like the Greek language and old stories. So I like greek culture. I am too short of knowledge about South Korea to be able to give any opinion. Can you give me more information about that land?

replies.body: yo kylo my best friend there are so many people that speak english and dutch like 1bj, steyn2g, kroestv2, creephunter, pel, justbudah and many others. i know for a fact that 1bj steyn2g and creephunter speak very good english. You should try contact them to do some translation. Also what the hell is Pirate English and who speaks it
